title: how to control the laptop keyboard of the player
body: i press everything but the character did not move at all... can explain to me the rule  of the game and the movement of player.... thanks

replies.body:
First off, welcome to League! o｜◕ˇ▽ˇ◕｜ツ

You can move your champion by right-clicking on a location on the screen. Using abilities is done with the **Q, W, E,** and  **R** keys and you can use your summoner spells with **D** and **F**. Those are the most basics of how to control and use abilities. We've actually written up a really neat guide for new players, which you can find [**HERE**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/new-player-guide). I definitely recommend checking it out!

If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask. Best of luck on the Fields of Justice!
